Articles.Content:
The story of a trip to Laythe.

Was going to go to at least one other body in the system but there was only enough delta v for the one landing. Probably due to very poor piloting.

Also, and this often happens to my spaceplanes that have been a long way, the aerodynamic parts fell off the plane on the way down and there was a bit of a crash.

Other than that it all went rather well.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

....and there was a bit of a crash.

Happens to the best of us!

Interesting to see that you recovered the transfer vehicle as well as the lander. Nice!
